binwalk.description: Tool for searching binary images for embedded files and executable code

photorec.description: Tool to recover lost files from harddisk, digital camera and cdrom

volatility.description: Memory forensics framework with multiple plugins to extract information from a RAM image

steghide.description: Program to extract or embed data in another file, hiding it (thus the name 'steghide')

stegsolve.description: Tool to perform different analysis on a file to determine if there's hidden data on it, and recover it

ctags.description: Provides tags for source code, so variables and functions can be easily found (even between different files)

zbarimg.description: Scans and decodes bar codes from image files

rpatool.description: Uncompresses archive (*.rpy) files with data of a game made with the engine 'RenPy'

rtlsdr_scanner.description: Python frequency scanning GUI for USB TV dongles, using the OsmoSDR rtl-sdr library.

scapy.description: Interactive packet manipulation tool, written in Python

j2k_to_image.description: Decodes j2k, jp2, and jpt files to pgm, ppm, pnm, pgx, and bmp

progress.description: Shows the progress of currently running file manipulation processes (tar, cp, mv, cat, grep...)

pdftk.description: Allows manipulating PDFs (merging, spliting, unpacking attachments...)

autopsy.description: Autopsy forensic browser. Starts a server and allows to analyze evidences (such as disc images)

yafu.description: Yet Another Factor Utility. Useful to factor large integers in a quick manner

inspectrum.description: Waterfall inspector for captured radio signals

nikto.description: Scan web server for known vulnerabilities
